name: mahnoorshk-bakra-eid-marketplace
author: Mahnoor Shaikh
description: BakraEidMarketplace is an interactive console application built with TypeScript and Inquirer.js, designed to streamline your Qurbani animal purchasing process for Bakra Eid. Whether you're looking to buy a goat, cow, sheep, or camel, our application ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.
